alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 9:17PM CDT until July 19 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Trego County in west central Kansas... Western Ellis County in central Kansas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 917 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Palco to 7 miles south of Quinter, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Trego Center, Yocemento, Hays and Munjor. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
